page.title: 03CHELMSFORD SOUTHERN BY PASS
page.content: The new road will be nine miles long,it goes from Margaretting to Boreham.There are twenty-two structures consisting of eighteen bridges and four culverts.The road cannot be built on top-soil,it has to be built on sub-soil. The huge trucks,when loaded,weigh up to 90 tons.The very large trucks have an engine which is twice as powerful as ordinary lorries.They run on diesel fuel and use up to 120 gallons a day.They have to be started by compressed air.The tyres have a diameter of over five feet.A large truck costs Â£80,000 and the machine which loads the truck costs Â£300,000 The men work a twelve hour day,from 7 a.m to 7 p.m.They have their breakfast at 11.a.m and their lunch break at 3 p.m. .
